actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of Antonio Meucci.

summary.text: Directs the Postmaster General to issue a commemorative postage stamp in honor of Antonio Meucci and his contributions to the invention of the telephone.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of Antonio Meucci.
